== Uninstalling Default Apps ==
* Dependencies: `android-tools`

`adb shell` must be used in the command line to connect to the device.

1. Enable USB debugging
2. Connect device to computer
3. Run `adb shell` in terminal

{{{
pm uninstall -k --user 0 com.android.gallery3d
pm uninstall -k --user 0 org.calyxos.eleven
}}}

== Reinstalling ==
For reinstalling programs deleted through the above method

{{{
adb shell cmd package install-exisiting com.android.documentsui
}}}

== Installing Foreign Apps == 
1. Get the link for the app
2. Hold click on it
3. Click 'open in external app'
4. Click 'Aurora Store'
5. Click install
